resources.description: Inspired by: Baccarat® Rouge 540 A delicate and sophisticated blend reminiscent of an amber floral and woody breeze. resources.description: The Museum360XL is the gold standard of HVAC scenting, covering multiple areas without the use of residue-creating, unnatural substances and sprays. Utilizing safe Cold Air Diffusion technology, the Museum360XL allows the user to create a total emersion experience through scent either in their home or business. The Museum360 XL’s state-of-the-art delivery system provides even and consistent fragrance distribution wherever it is used. Additionally, it distributes the scent in multiple areas at pre-selected concentration levels, all the while keeping the therapeutic properties of the essential oils. This diffuser is easy to install and integrate into existing HVAC systems and is a complete home or business fragrance distribution system. Manage when scenting occurs through an easy-to-use internal digital time. Supplement large spaces, such as entire homes, hotel floors, and mall wings, with the Museum360 HVAC Scent Diffuser. | Aroma360 Museum360 XL Scent Diffuser
